sentences.english: Rolling captions are offen used in movie or TV head and end.
sentences.chinese: 滾動字幕是電影或電視中片頭和片尾經常使用的手段。

sentences.english: Are you touched by the music when the movie ends?
sentences.chinese: 電影落幕時，你被它的片尾曲感動了嗎？

sentences.english: They show how, at the end, we depend on the legends of our lives to give them meaning.
sentences.chinese: 片尾，他們都講了如何賦與生活中的傳奇以現實意義。

sentences.english: And sometimes they show it the end of the movie.
sentences.chinese: 有的影片在片尾把這些放出來。

sentences.english: I tried the top of the line of Irish whistle that originally made in Irish later on.
sentences.chinese: 戲中最後採用的也是這一版，並且作爲片尾曲。
